Version 2.0.51 - Directly Modify cmi Backing Store + Instant API Traps

Root Cause Found

  • Storyline does NOT call LMSGetValue('cmi.suspend_data') during initialization
  • It reads directly from Moodle's pre-populated cmi JavaScript object
  • Our LMSGetValue interceptor NEVER catches the initial read
  • Additionally, 200ms polling gap could let Storyline read before wrapper installed

Fix: Direct Backing Store Modification

  • Before wrapping LMSGetValue/LMSSetValue, directly call original LMSSetValue
  • Updates cmi.suspend_data and cmi.core.lesson_location in the backing store
  • Storyline reads the correct data regardless of whether it uses the API or direct access

Fix: Object.defineProperty API Traps

  • Uses Object.defineProperty on window.API and window.API_1484_11
  • Detects API creation INSTANTLY (eliminates 200ms polling gap)
  • Wrapper is installed the exact moment Moodle assigns the API object

Previous Version

  • v2.0.50: Added navigation_starting signal (still insufficient)
